name: Experiment FREE
description:
Your help is needed in this extremely diverse Match 3 game! One day Sophie, the heroine of Experiment, awakes suddenly to find herself in an empty room. Her memory is totally blank and she cannot understand how she got there. Now it is up to you to guide amnesiac Sophie through this unique Match 3 game – She is depending on you and your help!

During the game Sophie will be put to the test with 120 challenging levels. A mysterious scientist has captured Sophie… she must submit to the experiments…

From now on she must follow the commands of the scientist without question. Otherwise the worst may happen, and time is not exactly on her side either. Help Sophie to have the courage to conclude the experiment so everyone is happy.

Features:
• A compelling story
• Match 3 game with numerous variations (17 different elements including bombs, keys and locks, TNT, etc.)
• 4 different play modes: story (with and without time limits), arcade and puzzle
• Link to the game centre, including achievements
• 120 levels for beginners to pros
• Brilliant graphics with impressive effects
• Atmospheric soundtrack including English voices

+++ 3GS not supported +++
